channel.title: Hugo on My Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on My Personal Blog

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description:
This is my first blog post! The static site generator is incredibly fast and easy to use.

Why I chose Hugo

Hugo offers several advantages:

  • Lightning fast build times
  • Simple content management
  • Great theme system
  • Built-in features like RSS feeds

Getting Started

Setting up a Hugo blog is straightforward…
